model_input:

Both classmates believe in striving to be the best version of themselves while also being kind and compassionate towards themselves and others.

Classmates A: That’s true. I feel like we can take this in any direction that we want.
Classmates B: Definitely. We can take our time, explore our feelings, and see where it all leads.
Classmates A: Agreed. I'm excited to see where this journey takes us.
Classmates B: Same here,. Let’s take things one step at a time and see where it goes from here.
